content.text: I'm an accountant and I love to play tennis. I've thought of joining the military when I was younger. I have 10 alpacas. What are your hobbies?
I live in the countryside, where there's plenty of space for my black lab to run around. I love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores.
What is your favorite place to eat?
My favorite place to eat is at home. I can control the ingredients and create my own unique recipes.
That's awesome! I like to cook too. I love to experiment with different flavors and ingredients.
Me too! I love to try new recipes and see how they turn out.
No, I've never been arrested. I did tell a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself.
Haha, that's a good one! I've never met a celebrity, but I've always wanted to.
I met one of my favorite celebrities when I was growing up in New Hampshire. I got his autograph and everything.
That's awesome! What celebrity did you meet?
I met Paul McCartney. He's my favorite Beatle.
It was a really cool experience
